Lousa is on the line to Serpins from Coimbra Parque station. There are two stations. Lousa A is reached first and is best for walking up into the Serra de Lousa and for seeing the small castle on the edge of the Serra. Lousa station is more central for the town.
Since January 2010, the railway tracks are being renovated and the train line is out of service for a period of two years. There is a replacement bus service from Coimbra-A station to Lousa.
The walk to the castle and the tiny chapel near it is delightful.
